branchaddress1.description: the first address line of the library

branchaddress2.description: the second address line of the library

branchaddress3.description: the third address line of the library

branchzip.description: the zip or postal code of the library

branchcity.description: the city or province of the library

branchstate.description: the reqional state of the library

branchphone.description: the primary phone of the library

branchfax.description: the fax number of the library

branchemail.description: the primary email address of the library

branchreplyto.description: the email to be used as a Reply-To

branchreturnpath.description: the email to be used as Return-Path

branchurl.description: the URL for your library or branch's website

branchip.description: the IP address for your library or branch

branchnotes.description: notes related to your library or branch
